condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: The Ministry of Education implements validated mechanisms, teaching practices, management tools and operational procedures to facilitate retention of students and inclusion of out-of-school adolescents

description.narrative: During 2019, the CO supported the expansion expanded initiatives such as ‘Hagamos Nuestra la Escuela' - Let's make the School Ours - that was implemented in eight municipalities and the ‘Soy Música' (I am Music) modality which has been extended to all regions in the country. These initiatives promote school retention and reinsertion strategies tailored to vulnerable students that are at risk of school dropout or lapsing into violence. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:10/02/2020

title.narrative: Number of schools prioritized by MINED and UNICEF that implement validated mechanisms, teaching methods, management tools and operational procedures aimed to facilitate OOSC retention and integration.
